World.title: What happens next after Trump tariffs ruled illegal?

World.title: Houthi rebels say Israeli airstrike killed their prime minister in Yemen's capital

Business.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy for 2nd time in less than a year
Business.description: The budget carrier filed for fresh bankruptcy protection months after emerging from a Chapter 11 reorganization. The airline said it plans to keep flying as usual during the restructuring process.

Business.description: Costa's owner Coca-Cola is reportedly looking to sell the chain as its popularity cools off. So has something gone wrong?

Business.description: As more major food brands commit to phasing out chemical dyes from snacks and cereals in the U.S., some are struggling to find natural replacements. Many consumers say they want bright colors.

Business.description: A survey this summer found families were going without heating or food to pay for uniform.

Business.description: The supermarket supplies fresh fruit, vegetables and meat to anyone struggling to make ends meet.

Culture.title: Gordon Ramsay says he had treatment to remove skin cancer
